thread.title: Ciber to Release Third Quarter 2015 Results on October 29, 2015
thread.title_full: Ciber to Release Third Quarter 2015 Results on October 29, 2015

title: Ciber to Release Third Quarter 2015 Results on October 29, 2015
text: Ciber to Release Third Quarter 2015 Results on October 29, 2015   Published on 2015-10-08 09:45:53 Ciber to Release Third Quarter 2015 Results on October 29, 2015 -- GREENWOOD VILLAGE, Colo.  <-   GREENWOOD VILLAGE, Colo.   Ciber, Inc. (NYSE: CBR ), a leading global information technology consulting, services and outsourcing company, invites you to participate in a conference call on Thursday, October 29, 2015 at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time to discuss the company's third quarter 2015 results. A press release highlighting Ciber's results will be available at approximately 7:00 a.m. Eastern Time that same day. The press release and live audiocast of the conference call will be available to the public at www.ciber.com/cbr . To participate in the conference call, dial 877-407-8293 (U.S.) or +1-201-689-8349 (outside the U.S.) ten minutes prior to the start of the call. A replay of the call and webcast will be available one hour after the call ends through November 31 , 2015. To access the telephone replay, dial 877-660-6853 (U.S.) or +1-201-612-7415 (outside the U.S.). The webcast replay will be available at www.ciber.com/cbr . About Ciber, Inc. Ciber is a global IT consulting company with some 6,500 consultants in North America , Europe and Asia/Pacific , and approximately $1 billion in annual business. Client focused and results driven, Ciber partners with organizations to develop technology strategies and solutions that deliver tangible business value. Founded in 1974, the company trades on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE: CBR ). For more information, visit www.ciber.com . Contact:
